Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Contains functions to search for words or phrases in Quran verses with various options including case-sensitivity and verse range filtering.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over Quran data and returns verses containing the given search word based on case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the search is case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. Returns verses containing the word group based on case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specific Surah. Returns verses where the given word is found in the specified surah.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number in which to search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a specific word group within a given Surah of the Quran data, using case-sensitive or insensitive comparison.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the search is case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word in the Quran data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences are to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) whose occurrences are to be counted.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran. Returns verses that fall within the range and contain the word.

parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
